rationale: The superlative 'deadliest' (form of deadly) modifies 'outbreak', fitting the comparative pattern based on examples.
statement_text: Avian flu has wiped out 50.54 million birds in the United States this year, making it [avian flu] the countryâ€™s deadliest outbreak in history, U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) data showed on Thursday.
